usg: Use to a name for the element. The value of the attribute is used to reference/associate the element from other elements. From javascript also it can be used to reference the element.

button.desc: it is submitted with form data. The name value need not be unique but can be shared among other with button elements.

fieldset.desc: it is submitted with form data.

form.desc: it should be a unique in the document.

iframe.desc: it can be used as the value of the target / formtarget attribute of other other elements.

input.desc: it is submitted with form data.

map.desc: it is used to associate with image element.
